Plot V(D)J gene usage

plot_usage.Rd

Plot V(D)J gene usage

plot_usage(
  sobj_in,
  gene_cols,
  cluster_col = NULL,
  chain = NULL,
  type = "heatmap",
  plot_colors = NULL,
  plot_genes = NULL,
  n_genes = NULL,
  clust_lvls = NULL,
  yaxis = "percent",
  chain_col = NULL,
  sep = ";",
  ...
)

Arguments

sobj_in

Seurat object containing V(D)J data
gene_cols

meta.data column containing genes used for each clonotype
cluster_col

meta.data column containing cell clusters to use for calculating gene usage
chain

Chain to use for calculating gene usage. Set to NULL to include all chains.
type

Type of plot to create, can be either 'heatmap' or 'bar'
plot_colors

Character vector containing colors for plotting
plot_genes

Character vector containing genes to plot
n_genes

Number of top genes to plot based on average usage
clust_lvls

Levels to use for ordering clusters
yaxis

Units to plot on the y-axis, either "frequency" or "percent"
chain_col

meta.data column containing chains for each cell
sep

Separator to use for expanding gene_cols
...

Additional arguments to pass to ggplot

Value

ggplot object
